Performer:
Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))

Dates: '1963-1980/07/09'

Specialty: Shamisen

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994); Nichigai WHO


– Click image to view.
